title: 0xc00007b error upon champion select
body:
I have read every single support discussion for DirectX9 and the error above, I've watched every video i can find. I believe that it is a league issue because all of my other games start up just fine. If you need any information feel free to ask. I recently had to replace my motherboard, it started with windows 10 and i played league just fine and so i changed to windows 7 because i don't care for 10 and now i cannot play league, after champion select even in a custom game i get application error (0xc00007b). I know that 7 often has issues with games and i've looked up problems with specifically windows 7.
Windows 7 sp1
AMD A10-6800K APU (w/Radeon HD graphics)
8 GB RAM
NVIDIA GTX 970 4gb acx2

replies.body: Thank you GoldPikaKnight, i submitted a ticket and now i'm waiting.

Hey Sarlyk, 

If you have tried everything to try and fix your issue with League, the next best step would be to submit a ticket. There, Riot Support can help you one on one try to figure out this issue and help you get back in the game.

Riot Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Hope this helps and they get you back in the game.
